name: Revenge of the white knight
description:
The game was made by the "Neon fox" team together with $Kristina_lo.

Controls:

  1. "X" shaped fire wall = "X"
  2. Crossbow = right mouse button
  3. "+" shaped fire wall = "C"
  4. Vapour trail ="V"
  5. Mine = "Z"

This is the post jam version (the original could not be saved. The programmer accidentally deleted it when fixing bugs). Here is the list of changes:

  • Changed the number of coins received per wave.
  • Crossbow and spells complete the code.
  • Critical bugs have been fixed, such as the ability to continue the game after death.

The old version of the game and its errors can be found here:
